name: Easy Sweet Chili
author: tmwood86
summary: I wanted to make a delicious Crockpot® chili that didn't take an hour to prepare. This one, you just open cans and dump them in! You can let this cook all day or it's ready after a couple of hours.
ingredients: 6 cloves garlic, finely chopped - or more to taste
2 (15 ounce) cans light red kidney beans, drained and rinsed
2 (15 ounce) cans dark red kidney beans, drained and rinsed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Crumble ground beef into a skillet over medium heat
Stir garlic, oregano, chili powder, and basil into the beef; cook and stir until beef is completely browned, 7 to 10 minutes
Combine light red kidney beans, dark red kidney beans, diced tomatoes, and corn in crock of a slow cooker
Stir cooked ground beef into the bean mixture
Stir sugar into the chili and continue cooking as long as you can wait, at least 6 hours
Season with salt and black pepper to serve
